arts.ttl: Ipswich win should give Brighton belief - Hurzeler
arts.sum: Brighton & Hove Albion head coach Fabian Hurzeler believes his side 'deserved' all three points after securing their first win in eight matches against Ipswich Town at Portman Road.

arts.ttl: Ipswich 'lost belief' after Brighton took the lead - McKenna
arts.sum: Ipswich boss Kieran McKenna says his side "lacked belief" after falling behind in their 2-0 loss to Brighton at Portman Road.

arts.ttl: Kieran McKenna plays down Joao Pedro’s challenge in Brighton clash
arts.sum: Pedro was fortunate to escape with only a booking after colliding with Walton early in the second half.

arts.ttl: 'Why' – Fabian Hurzeler reacts at Joao Pedro claim after Chris Walton clash at Ipswich Town
arts.sum: Reaction from Brighton’s victory at Ipswich Town

arts.ttl: Brighton beat Ipswich to end winless run
arts.sum: Brighton & Hove Albion ended a run of eight Premier League matches without a win by beating Ipswich Town 2-0 at Portman Road. But the second half of Thursday's game demonstrated just how cruel the Premier League can be for a goalkeeper, and Walton must pick himself up quickly ahead of a daunting run of fixtures.

arts.ttl: Ipswich 0-2 Brighton: Highlights, man of the match, stats as Rutter helps seal Seagulls win
arts.sum: Brighton claim an important victory on the road against Ipswich Town to climb to ninth in the Premier League table.

arts.ttl: 'Peak housery' – Brighton player ratings at Ipswich as No 1 mischief-maker scores 9-10
arts.sum: How the Seagulls rated against the Tractor Boys at Portman Road

arts.ttl: Brighton beat Ipswich to claim first Premier League win since November
arts.sum: Kaoru Mitoma and Georginio Rutter scored second-half goals at Portman Road.

arts.ttl: Fabian Hurzeler makes bold call on Brighton's £55m duo ahead of Ipswich
arts.sum: All the latest team news for Brighton and Hove Albion ahead of Ipswich

arts.ttl: Man Utd vs. Southampton and Ipswich vs. Brighton - LIVE
arts.sum: Follow Mail Sport's live blog for the latest live, score, team news and updates of Manchester United vs Southampton and Ipswich Town vs Brighton in the Premier League.
